0: I told the snooty guy that I have a reservation for the previous night but he would not believe it as the hotel was full there was a marathon event in the city on the day I arrived
Can walk to many other restaurants andor venues
The hotel was connected to the mall and convention center so we rarely had to go outside
The only complaint is that when there are a large number of guests coming from a convention or concert the elevators are very slow

Although they do not offer complimentary breakfast which would be great for people coming for conventions and needing to move through breakfast quickly they have many restaurants right in the hotel that are awesome
We were there on a busy weekend with a lot of events and the hotel was clearly quite full but I felt service was lacking even considering that
They seem completely incapable of handling the crowd from the convention as the Starbucks in the lobby had a line of people 30 deep and only two employees working
Elevators do get slow and full with conferences
we booked the Hyat Regency because we were going to an event at the Pavilion at Pan Am and would be having drinks
The hotel our convention was booked so we stayed at the Hyat Regency near by
1: Excellent venue for this type of activity
I was attending TAPI PaperCon and selected the Hyat Regency from the choice of conference hotels
Front desk outstanding housekeeping spectacular room clean and spacious wonderful location easy walk to numerous restaurants Convention Center sports venues
Great location for the Convention Center and great service
There is so much within walking distance it is incredible shopping restaurants Lucas Oil the convention center etc
Overall a good experience in light of high hotel traffic with several conferences and a major marching band event
the hotel is downtown Indianapolis and is connected to the Indianapolis Convention Center so you can walk from your hotel into the shopping mall and convention center
We stayed at the Hyat Regency Indianapolis location for a convention
Visited for a business event taking place in the hotel and everything was quite impressive
